page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: {Housing}in {Lanark}is quite varied with a mixture of privately owned houses and {Council Houses.}Generally speaking {Lanark }is a sought after place for people to live,therefore the property prices tend to be high.Also { {Lanark}is within commuting distance of Glasgow.{Lanark}is also a desirable place for a person wanting a {Council {House} as the stock of houses is good and there are few slum properties. The relative absence of widespread vandalism is another attraction.During the past decade there have been quite a few private houses built,but few additions to the {Council House } stock. A recent development has been the construction of Sheltered Housing by the {District Council}.Historically some of the houses in {Lanark }are of merit especially in Hope Street.
